because of this list :-) DOH!!

----- Original Message -----
From: Diina, David <DDiina@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, August 03, 1999 11:21 AM
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] RE: centaur armor


> From: "Diina, David" <DDiina@...>
>
> Crafted armor is lore but it can be sold and
traded......so for warriors
you
> will have to take the armor off your back (or legs) and
sell it first then
> go and get some more.....so I suggest you get the item for
the quest again
> first, then sell...incidentally the items that are
required for each piece
> (not including the store bought jewels) are NO DROP and
LORE maybe that is
> what you heard
